long_description: These boys' Vibram FiveFingers Speed shoes offer minimalist performance with casual style and everyday versatility. Individual toe slots enhance dexterity, control and stability to deliver a natural walking motion. Thin, abrasion-resistant polyamide fabric and stretch polyester fits low on feet and offers breathable, quick-drying comfort with classic looks. Traditional lacing system accommodates a wide range of foot shapes and provides a secure fit. Footbeds feature AEGIS Microbe Shield(R) antimicrobial treatment to help deter odor development. Thin EVA midsoles help provide light cushioning underfoot. Vibram outsoles are designed to follow the contours of feet and toes; made of nonmarking Vibram TC1 performance rubber. Recommended for casual wear. In order to allow kids' feet to adapt to using different muscles, gradually increase usage of these shoes. The boys' Vibram FiveFingers Speed shoes are machine washable in cold water; air dry only. To determine size, stand with heels against a wall and measure from the wall to the tip of the longest toe; use the longest toe length in conjunction with the size chart.
short_description: These boys' Vibram FiveFingers Speed shoes offer minimalist performance with casual style and everyday versatility.
